artview.plugins.DealiasRegionBased.dealias_region_based¶

DealiasRegionBased.dealias_region_based()[source]¶

Mount Options and execute dealias_region_based. The resulting fields are added to Vradar. Vradar is updated, strong or weak depending on overwriting old fields.

Previous topic

artview.plugins.DealiasRegionBased.chooseRadar

Next topic
